voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang:
Welcome to your 66th Japanese lesson where we will learn basic nature words: mountain, river, forest, and beach.
Firstly, let's start with the term for "mountain". It is

voice.lang: . An example sentence is: "The river is near the house.", this translates to:

lang.mstts:prosody: 川は家の近くにあります
